Class: Vector

goo\math/Vector

Vector with N components.

new Vector(Integer size)

Method summary

<static> Float distance (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return sqrt((rhs - lhs)•(rhs - lhs));".
<static> Float distanceSquared (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the squared distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return (rhs - lhs)•(rhs - lhs);". When comparing the relative
distances between two points it is usually sufficient to compare the squared distances, thus avoiding an expensive square root
operation.
<static> Boolean equals (Vector lhs, Vector rhs)

Compares two vectors for approximate equality. Equivalent of "return (lhs ~ rhs);".
<static> Vector add (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs, Vector target)

Performs a component-wise addition and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs + rhs);".
<static> Vector apply (Matrix lhs, Vector rhs, Vector target)

Applys a matrix to a vector and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs•rhs);".
<static> Vector copy (Vector source, Vector target)

Copies component values and stores them in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = source);".
<static> Vector div (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs, Vector target)

Performs a component-wise division and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs / rhs);".
<static> Float dot (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the dot product between two vectors. Equivalent of "return lhs•rhs;".
<static> Vector mul (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs, Vector target)

Performs a component-wise multiplication and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs * rhs);".
<static> Vector sub (Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs, Vector target)

Performs a component-wise subtraction and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs - rhs);".
Vector add (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Performs a component-wise addition and stores the result locally. Equivalent of "return (this = this + rhs);".
Vector apply (Matrix lhs)

Applys a matrix to a vector and stores the result locally. Equivalent of "return (this = lhs•this);".
Vector clone ()

Clones the vector. Equivalent of "return (clone = this)".
Vector copy (Vector source)

Copies component values and stores them locally. Equivalent of "return (this = source);".
Float distance (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return sqrt((rhs - this)•(rhs - this));".
Float distanceSquared (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the squared distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return (rhs - this)•(rhs - this);". When comparing the
relative distances between two points it is usually sufficient to compare the squared distances, thus avoiding an expensive square
root operation.
Vector div (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Performs a component-wise division and stores the result locally. Equivalent of "return (this = this / rhs);".
Float dot (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Computes the dot product between two vectors. Equivalent of "return this•rhs;".
Boolean equals (Vector rhs)

Compares two vectors for approximate equality. Equivalent of "return (this ~ rhs);"
Vector invert ()

Inverts all component values of the vector. Equivalent of "return (this = 0.0 - this);".
Float length ()

Computes the length of the vector. Equivalent of "return sqrt(this•this);".
Float lengthSquared ()

Computes the squared length of the vector. Equivalent of "return this•this;".
Vector mul (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Performs a component-wise addition and stores the result locally. Equivalent of "return (this = this * rhs);".
Vector normalize ()

Normalizes the vector to unit length. Equivalent of "return (this = this/sqrt(this•this));".
Vector scale (number factor)

Scales the vector
Vector set (Vector|Float[]|...Float arguments)

Sets the components of the vector.
Vector sub (Vector|Float[] rhs)

Performs a component-wise addition and stores the result locally. Equivalent of "return (this = this - rhs);".
String toString ()

Converts the vector to a string.

Constructor

new Vector(Integer size)

Creates a new vector.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
size Integer

Number of vector components.
Properties:
Name Type Description
data Float32Array

Storage for the vector components.

Methods

<static> distance(Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs) → {Float}

Computes the distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return sqrt((rhs - lhs)•(rhs - lhs));".

Parameters:
Name Type Description
lhs Vector | Float[]

Vector or array of scalars on the left-hand side.
rhs Vector | Float[]

Vector or array of scalars on the right-hand side.
Returns:

Distance.

Type
Float

<static> distanceSquared(Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs) → {Float}

Computes the squared distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return (rhs - lhs)•(rhs - lhs);". When comparing the relative
distances between two points it is usually sufficient to compare the squared distances, thus avoiding an expensive square root
operation.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
lhs Vector | Float[]

Vector or array of scalars on the left-hand side.
rhs Vector | Float[]

Vector or array of scalars on the right-hand side.
Returns:

Squared distance.

Type
Float

Compares two vectors for approximate equality. Equivalent of "return (lhs ~ rhs);".

Parameters:

lhs Vector

Vector on the left-hand side.
rhs Vector

Vector on the right-hand side.
Returns:

True if equal.

<static> add(Vector|Float[] lhs, Vector|Float[] rhs, Vector target) → {Vector}

Performs a component-wise addition and stores the result in a separate vector. Equivalent of "return (target = lhs + rhs);".

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description

Vector or array of scalars.
target Vector <optional>

Target vector for storage.
Throws:
If the arguments are of incompatible sizes.
Type
IllegalArguments
Returns:

A new vector if the target vector is omitted, else the target vector.

Computes the distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return sqrt((rhs - this)•(rhs - this));".

Parameters:
Name Type Description

Vector or array of scalars on the right-hand side.
Returns:

Distance.

Type
Float

distanceSquared(Vector|Float[] rhs) → {Float}

Computes the squared distance between two vectors. Equivalent of "return (rhs - this)•(rhs - this);". When comparing the
relative distances between two points it is usually sufficient to compare the squared distances, thus avoiding an expensive square
root operation.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
rhs Vector | Float[]

Vector or array of scalars on the right-hand side.
Returns:

Squared distance.

Vector

normalize() → {Vector}

Normalizes the vector to unit length. Equivalent of "return (this = this/sqrt(this•this));".

Throws:
If the magnitude of the vector is incredibly small.
Type
NormalizationError
Returns:

Self for chaining.
